author: Gino D'Acampo
method: To make the poached plums, place all of the ingredients into a small saucepan over a medium heat and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer the plums for ten minutes. Drain the plums and place in the freezer for three minutes to cool quickly. To make the chocolate mousse, mix together the cream and grated chocolate in a bowl. Place a 7cm/3in chefs' ring in the centre of a plate and fill the ring with the chocolate and cream mixture. Heat the sides of the chefs' ring with a mini-blowtorch and carefully remove. To serve, place the cooled plums around the chocolate cream mousse.
ingredients: 2 plums, halved and stones removed ,  1 lemon, juice only,  100ml/3½oz red wine,  150ml/5fl oz double cream, whipped until stiff,  50g/1¾oz dark chocolate, grated
